content.raw: Yesterday we modified two of our X4 PRs \(353 and 367\) to increment the configuration number from 1, but we did not create new branches or pull requests. Is it better to create new branches and pull requests like this is doing, or does modifying existing pull requests without changing the branch name suffice?
content.html: Yesterday we modified two of our X4 PRs (353 and 367) to increment the configuration number from 1, but we did not create new branches or pull requests.
